Title: Tele◯Potion
Description: ["Music video directed by Ryo Hirano for the title track of Tavito Nanao's twelfth single ", TELE◯POTION, '. This movie edit version of the song was featured in the 2014 film adaptation of Hiromi Kawakami\'s romance novel "Nishino Yukihiko no koi to bouken".']
